words.def: a cleansing agent made from the salts of vegetable or animal fats
(Roman mythology) goddess of abundance and fertility
(ballet) a step in dancing (especially in classical ballet)
a watery solution of sugars, salts, and minerals that circulates through the vascular system of a plant
piece of solid food for dipping in a liquid
a health resort near a spring or at the seaside
op Op art ; a style of abstract art.
an informal term for a father
a very poisonous metallic element that has three allotropic forms
the syllable naming the fifth (dominant) note of any musical scale in solmization
